title: Former Virginia governor Terry McAuliffe visits front line in Ukraine
description: After visiting the front line where his convoy came under fire, ex-Governor Terry McAuliffe said he was more convinced than ever that the United States must help Ukraine.

title: ‘Betrayed and let down’: Syrians react as Assad welcomed back to Arab fold
description: President Bashar al-Assad was welcomed back to Arab League on Friday, "as if the past 12 years of suffering and bloodshed never occurred,” one Syrian said.

title: Brazil indicts ex-officials over Amazon murder of journalist and colleague
description: Police say the Indigenous agency's former president and vice president failed to act to prevent the murders of Bruno Pereira and Dom Phillips in the Amazon last year.

title: At G-7 summit, leaders call for international standards on AI
description: New technologies should be governed by democratic values, G-7 leaders said, adding that international guidelines have not kept pace with AI's rapid growth.

title: Why a Starbucks ad on trans rights sparked joy and fury in India
description: Critics accused Starbucks of importing "woke" Western ideologies to India, but the country has a long history with transgender rights.

title: Ukraine found an unlikely tool to resist Russia: Solar panels
description: Ukrainians are putting solar panels on hospitals to fight blackouts.

title: Biden meets G-7 leaders in Japan as Zelensky lands in Hiroshima
description: Ukraine's president arrived in a dramatic last-minute visit to the G-7 summit as President Biden sought to mobilize allies against a rising China's economic power.

title: Indigenous Australian journalist resigns after ‘relentless’ racist abuse
description: Stan Grant said Australia's public broadcaster did not support him when he was "racially mocked or abused,” especially after he criticized the British monarchy.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky likely to meet Biden at G-7 summit, U.S. official says
description: White House national security adviser Jake Sullivan said it was a "safe bet" the leaders would meet while they are in Japan for the Group of Seven summit.

title: Lebanon deporting refugees to Syria to face an uncertain fate
description: Once across the border, some of the men have disappeared into Syrian custody. Others are in hiding. Rights groups are calling for a halt to the deportations.

title: Bowing to pressure, Biden relents on F-16s to Ukraine
description: Kyiv now appears in line to get F-16 fighter jets by the fall, as Washington agrees to let other nations send them into battle.
